    • migrate

      public void migrate() throws Database.DBNotInitializedException, FileNotFoundException
      Carries out migrations specified in assets/migrations
      Throws:
      Database.DBNotInitializedException - if Database is not initialized prior to migration
      FileNotFoundException - if migration file isn't found
